title: Make blast only available in rampage mode
Fix WebAssembly out of memory error
description: WebAssembly OOM caused by creating too many non-pooled Cop instances when preserving appearance. Reverted to random cop spawning to fix memory leak.

description: ESLint commit changed console.log to console.warn. Need to clarify what logging is missing or if we should allow console.log again for debug purposes.

description: Currently visual-only. Apply half-rate multiplier to actual score.

title: Add visuals for rampage modes

When downgrading vehicles, cops in those vehicles should despawn
description: When player's vehicle tier changes (upgrade or downgrade), despawn cops from the previous tier. Example: Upgrade Bike→Moto should despawn bike cops. Downgrade Moto→Foot should despawn moto cops. Prevents unfair deaths from cops you can no longer outrun.

title: CRITICAL: Fix animation mixer event listener leak
HIGH: Throttle React stats updates to 20-30fps
Cop kills extend combo timer by +2s
description: Incentivize hunting cops instead of avoiding them.

title: Implement vehicle switching/downgrading
description: Currently destroying vehicle forces downgrade to Foot. This works. But need to verify: should there be voluntary vehicle switching or is destruction-based downgrade sufficient?

description: Find perf issues in particle systems, decals, shadows, materials, draw calls

title: Fix bicycle attack doc - remove 'must be moving' requirement

description: Prevent full reset via strategic kiting.
